item.title: ğŸŸ¡ 08:15 Alarm lifted in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in: - Marhanets city and Marhanets territorial community - Chervonohryhoriv territorial community

Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in: - Marhanets city and Marhanets territorial community - Chervonohryhoriv territorial community #Dnipropetrovsk_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.
